price: 252. Wana ezali mikapo mia Allah tozali kotangela yo yango na bosôló. Mpe ya sôló ozali moko okati ya batindami.
arabic: تِلۡكَ ءَايَٰتُ ٱللَّهِ نَتۡلُوهَا عَلَيۡكَ بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَمِنَ ٱلۡمُرۡسَلِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: til'ka āyātu al-lahi natlūhā ʿalayka bil-ḥaqi wa-innaka lamina al-mur'salīna
